entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CrossGen2 musl nupkg embed the libc host #73908
  • [NativeAOT] RhGetCodeTarget fails if executable code cannot be read #73906
    Future
  • [wasm] Tests failing to build with trimming #73901
  • AssemblyLoadContext issue, needs better documentation or default behavior for AssemblyLoadContext #73900
    Future
  • Directory.CreateDirectory with UnixFileMode: behavior for missing parents #73899
  • Performance has doubled since a couple of days ago. #73891
  • [wasm] warning WASM0001: Could not get pinvoke, or callbacks for method 'EnumUILanguages' because 'Parsing function pointer types in signatures is not supported.' #73880

Closed

  • [arm64] JIT assertion failures for valid C# code #73804
    7.0.0
  • Developers targeting browser-wasm can use Web Crypto APIs #40074
    7.0.0
  • matrix4x4createfromaxisangletest failing on NativeAOT #72149
    8.0.0
  • Incorrect certificate chain used in SslStream_UntrustedCaWithCustomTrust_OK test. #73295
    8.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Net.Security #73851
    7.0.0
  • [Mono] TypeLoadException for class with variant interfaces #68033
    7.0.0
  • ChannelReader documentation error #73904
  • [API Proposal]: Guid from int128 and Guid to int128 #73781
    Future
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration APIs haven't been AOT-annotated #71654
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] ArgumentNullException.ParamName is missing #73723
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Parameters of type Enum not supported with icalls #61277
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator does not support incremental build #53039
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator 2.2.0 - created assemblies are not added to the nuget package #2335
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: DataContract API's to enable external Schema Import/Export package #72242
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: XSD DCS Schema API's from 4.8 #72243
    7.0.0
  • SchemaExporter.ExportEnumDataContract is never called, but has a NullReferenceException #41448
    7.0.0
  • System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.FromMappings throws NullReferenceException using a pre-generated serialization assembly #68659
    7.0.0
  • "[XmlException] Data at the root level is invalid" at xml app.config read since .Net6 #67136
  • .NET 6 XmlSerializer no longer emits line breaks #64885
    7.0.0
  • XmlSerializer Behavior Change in .NET 6 #63585
  • Returned writer from XmlDictionaryWriter.CreateTextWriter doesn't implement IXmlTextWriterInitializer #66045
  • Fatal CLR error when XML serializing ImmutableArray, related to reflection #66163
  • No way to set TransactionManager.DefaultTimeout #71025
  • `System.Runtime.Serialization`'s `DataContractJsonSerializer.ReadObject` loses the sign when reading "-0" as a double #69019
  • XmlSerializer throws exception on creation if using derived type that only partially overrides a property #58257
    7.0.0
  • System.Security work planned for .NET 7 #64488
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] BP on hidden line; debugger should stop at the next available line #42704
    7.0.0
  • PipeReader.ReadAtLeast API conformance #66577
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Stress crash in ThreadStore::DetachCurrentThread #73116
    7.0.0
  • System.Runtime work planned for .NET 7 #64603
    7.0.0
  • Test failure:baseservices/exceptions/simple/ParallelCrash/ParallelCrash.sh #56950
    7.0.0
  • asan reports mismatched new[] vs delete #73789

PullRequests

Created

  • Unify MaxResponseHeadersLength calculations #73907
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Fix and simplify __has_builtin conditions #73905
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reduce contention for Datacontract Serialization #73893
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Add JSON Int128 and UInt128 support #73892
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix handling of corrupted state exceptions on Windows #73889
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Fix runtime pack aliasing #73885
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Misc tests related fixes #73884
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Fix arm64 scalar intrinsic use with small arguments #73876
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Streamline String.Substring #73882
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Remove ActiveIssue for Matrix4x4CreateFromAxisAngleTest #73870
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Baseline failing tests #73888
    area-System.Security
  • ignore name mismatch when IgnoreInvalidName is set #73745
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add missing NegotiateAuthentication documentation #73890
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [metadata] Do less initialization in mono_class_is_assignable #73786
    area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.0
  • Port IndexOfAny(ref char, char[1-5], int) to Vector128/256 #73469
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • EnableAOTAnalyzer for Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting #73853
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [wasm] Support parameters of type Enum with icalls #73817
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • More updates for recent compiler changes for ref fields #73883
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allow for null XmlSerialziers when loading pre-gen from mappings. #73827
    area-Serialization, 7.0.0
  • Bring back readability lost in .Net 6, and stop emitting BOM. #73731
    area-Serialization, 7.0.0
  • Implement IXmlTextWriterInitializer on the async writer wrapper. #73730
    area-Serialization, 7.0.0
  • 66163 fatal error xml serializer immutable array #73729
    area-Serialization, 7.0.0
  • Fix `DataContractJsonSerializer`'s handling of -0.0 #69020
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • DCS alignment to 4.8 with schema support #71752
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Update for recent compiler changes for ref fields #73466
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Revert "Add annotations to System.Private.DataContractSerialization" #73878
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Breakpoint set in a invalid line, set it to the next available line #73189
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix ASAN-detected alloc-dealloc mismatch #73820
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • [mono][jit] box+callvirt optimization #73456
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm-mt] Use asset loading for dotnet.worker.js; update WasmAppBuilder #73697
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • fix handling of client cert on macOS #73574
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x
  • [wasm] cleanup testing and host support in templatest and tests #73785
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 12.0.3 to 13.0.1 in /src/libraries/Common/tests/System/Net/Prerequisites/NetCoreServer #71180
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, .NET
  • Optimized string.Replace(char, char) #67049
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Update runtime repo to use Preview 7 SDK #72145
    area-Infrastructure
  • Improve XmlDictionaryWriter UTF8 encoding performance #73336
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Add tests and improve binary XmlDictionaryReader performance #73332
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Unmanaged structs are considered blittable if module has `DisableRuntimeMarshallingAttribute` #73310
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] amend the tests' building on LA64. #73840
    NO-MERGE, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Make public EventBookmark's constructor and BookmarkText property #73548
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: Guarded devirtualization #64497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid unused NetEventSource code #73868
    area-System.Net
  • Product dependencies in Versions.props must be on the latest patch version for libraries dependencies #73871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
